Title: A Simple Plan
Writer: Scott B. Smith (novel), Scott B. Smith (screenplay)
Actors: Bill Paxton, Bridget Fonda, Billy Bob Thornton, Brent Briscoe
Plot: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 22 nominations.
